Name: Parked
Short description for display help: Cavity is tuned off frequency so it doesn’t affect the beam.

Name: Any of the PVs needed by the display are offline
Short description for display help: Invalid: one of the PVs necessary is not responding to caget or has INVALID status

Name: Awaiting Run Up: Station needs attention from LLRF/SRF groups before can be used. A status set and cleared by experts.
Short description for display help: Awaiting Run Up: Cavity is ready to be commissioned by experts but not ready to be used to accelerate beam

Name: Maintenance (Station is known to be bad and awaiting attention from experts)
Short description for display help: Maintenance: Cavity is known to be bad and needs attention from experts

Name: Hardware Initialization (a.k.a. rack checkout) needs to be run
Short description for display help: Hardware Initialization needs to be run. Don't trust current values.

Name: Check phase: if something is done to the system that makes 0 phase no longer knowable and ops need to re-gold. A status set and cleared by experts
Short description for display help: Check Phase: Cavity phase is in an indeterminate state and needs to be measured with the beam before being usable

Name: NIRP or other individual SSA interlocks like PPS
SSA Permit
Short description for display help: SSA permit to turn on faulted

Name: SSA Faulted
Short description for display help: SSA not on

Name: SSA Faulted
Short description for display help: SSA not on

Name: LLRF has shifted the frequency
Short description for display help: LLRF Frequency is offset from nominal - look at PV severity

Name: He Level, and He Pressure are summed into the Cryo Summary Interlock in the Resonance/Interlock Chassis
Short description for display help: CM Cryo Summary (He pressure, He Level, and CP Ready) faulted

Name: He Level, and He Pressure are summed into the Cryo Summary Interlock in the Resonance/Interlock Chassis
Short description for display help: CM Cryo Summary (He pressure, He Level, and CP Ready) faulted

Name: Resonance/Interlock Link (cryo summary and items 4-8 summed here)
Short description for display help: Resonance/ Interlock Summary (Cryo Summary, beamline vacuum, coupler vacuum, coupler temps, and stepper temps) faulted

Name: Beamline Vacuum
Short description for display help: Beamline Vacuum too high

Name: Beamline Vacuum
Short description for display help: Beamline Vacuum too high

Name: Coupler Vacuum
Short description for display help: Coupler manifold vacuum too high

Name: Coupler Vacuum
Short description for display help: Coupler manifold vacuum too high

Name: Coupler Temperature 1
Short description for display help: Temperature sensor on the top of the coupler indicates high temp.

Name: Coupler Temperature 2
Short description for display help: Temperature sensor on the bottom of the coupler indicates high temp.

Name: Stepper Temperature
Short description for display help: Temperature sensor on cavity tuner stepper motor out of tolerance.

Name: Quench
Short description for display help: LLRF system detected a cavity quench

Name: Interlock Summary Fault
Short description for display help: Latched cavity interlock summary fault

Name: Cavity Characterization needs to be run
Short description for display help: Due to changes in the LLRF system, the cavity characterization needs to be run.

Name: Cavity Calibration required
Short description for display help: Cavity Calibration needed before use

Name: RF (not) Ready for Beam
Short description for display help: RF not ready for beam: mode is not SELAP and/or RF is off

Name: Piezo feedback not on
Short description for display help: Piezo Feedback is not on

Name: Piezo feedback indicating problem
Short description for display help: Piezo Feedback is indicating a problem

Name: Amplitude feedback of measured gradient is too low
Short description for display help: The feedback maintaining the amplitude is unable to keep the amplitude within tolerance. (Must be checked after RFREADYFORBEAM)

Name: Phase feedback shows phase out of tolerance
Short description for display help: The feedback maintaining the phase is unable to keep the phase within tolerance. (Must be checked after RFREADYFORBEAM)

Name: Summary of the feedback errors
Short description for display help: The feedback is unable to keep either phase or amplitude within tolerance. (Must be checked after RFREADYFORBEAM)

Name: Amplitude Jitter
Short description for display help: (maybe not needed)

Name: Phase Jitter
Short description for display help: (maybe not needed)

Name: Any statuses from the cryo instrumentation list for specific cavities (vs CM as a whole)? Heater, HOM coupler clamp temps, including Helium level and pressure
Short description for display help: If these turn yellow, put some warning up on the display

Name: Any analog instrumentation that feeds an interlock if it turns yellow, show it, including Helium level and pressure
